drivers.name: ptouch
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

CUPS raster driver for Brother's P-Touch label printers.

Foomatic data to generate the PPD files is included with the driver, therefore we do not provide this data and PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
For arbitrary graphics, this printer can only print raster lines 24 pixels wide down the centre of the tape (and this way also arbitrary fonts in low resolution). It can print text using its built-in fonts, but that would require a special text-to-PT-PC driver.

Consumables/Refills: Black on White Thermal Paper, Fabric Tape Blue on White, Flexi Tape, Iron on Black Tape, Security Tape Black on White, Strong Adhesive Tape, TX tape widths w: 1=6mm, 2=9mm, 3=12mm, 4=18mm, 5=24mm; TX foreground colours f: 1=black, 2=red, 3=blue, 4=gold, 5=white; TX background colours b: 1=clear, 2=white, 3=black, 4=red, 5=blue, 6=yellow, 7=green, 8=gold
